mapper.sql: tfi_uuid, tfc_uuid, flow_no, flow_cn_name, flow_en_name, flow_entrance, flow_version, flow_state, flow_start_time, flow_limit_hour, flow_end_time, flow_end_limit_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_flow_instance
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_flow_instance
tfi_uuid,
tfc_uuid,
flow_no,
flow_cn_name,
flow_en_name,
flow_entrance,
flow_version,
flow_state,
flow_start_time,
flow_limit_hour,
flow_end_time,
flow_end_limit_time,
#{tfiUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tfcUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flowCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flowEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flowEntrance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flowVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flowState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flowLimitHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flowEndLimitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_flow_instance
tfi_uuid = #{record.tfiUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tfc_uuid = #{record.tfcUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_no = #{record.flowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_cn_name = #{record.flowCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_en_name = #{record.flowEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_entrance = #{record.flowEntrance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_version = #{record.flowVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_state = #{record.flowState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
flow_start_time = #{record.flowStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flow_limit_hour = #{record.flowLimitHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
flow_end_time = #{record.flowEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flow_end_limit_time = #{record.flowEndLimitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update t_flow_instance set tfi_uuid = #{record.tfiUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tfc_uuid = #{record.tfcUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_no = #{record.flowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_cn_name = #{record.flowCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_en_name = #{record.flowEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_entrance = #{record.flowEntrance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_version = #{record.flowVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_state = #{record.flowState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flow_start_time = #{record.flowStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flow_limit_hour = #{record.flowLimitHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flow_end_time = #{record.flowEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flow_end_limit_time = #{record.flowEndLimitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update t_flow_instance
tfc_uuid = #{tfcUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_no = #{flowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_cn_name = #{flowCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_en_name = #{flowEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_entrance = #{flowEntrance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_version = #{flowVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_state = #{flowState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
flow_start_time = #{flowStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flow_limit_hour = #{flowLimitHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
flow_end_time = #{flowEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flow_end_limit_time = #{flowEndLimitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where tfi_uuid = #{tfiUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_flow_instance set tfc_uuid = #{tfcUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_no = #{flowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_cn_name = #{flowCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_en_name = #{flowEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_entrance = #{flowEntrance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_version = #{flowVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_state = #{flowState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flow_start_time = #{flowStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flow_limit_hour = #{flowLimitHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flow_end_time = #{flowEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flow_end_limit_time = #{flowEndLimitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where tfi_uuid = #{tfiUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: a.tfi_uuid,a.tfc_uuid,a.flow_no,a.flow_cn_name,a.flow_en_name,a.flow_entrance,a.flow_version,a.flow_state, (case when a.flow_state='1' then '进行中' when a.flow_state='2' then '已完成' end) as flow_state_name, a.flow_start_time,a.flow_end_time,a.flow_end_limit_time, b.ID_ as taskId,b.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as task_step_key,b.name_ as task_step_name,b.CLAIM_TIME_ as claim_time,b.CREATE_TIME_ as task_start_time,'' as task_end_time,b.SUSPENSION_STATE_ as task_state, (case when b.SUSPENSION_STATE_='1' then '进行中' when b.SUSPENSION_STATE_='2' then '挂起' end) as task_state_name

a.tfi_uuid,a.tfc_uuid,a.flow_no,a.flow_cn_name,a.flow_en_name,a.flow_entrance,a.flow_version,a.flow_state, (case when a.flow_state='1' then '进行中' when a.flow_state='2' then '已完成' end) as flow_state_name, a.flow_start_time,a.flow_end_time,a.flow_end_limit_time, b.ID_ as taskId,b.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as task_step_key,b.name_ as task_step_name,b.CLAIM_TIME_ as claim_time,b.START_TIME_ as task_start_time,b.END_TIME_ as task_end_time,'99' as task_state, '已完成' as task_state_name

a.tfi_uuid,a.tfc_uuid,a.flow_no,a.flow_cn_name,a.flow_en_name,a.flow_entrance,a.flow_version,a.flow_state, (case when a.flow_state='1' then '进行中' when a.flow_state='2' then '已完成' end) as flow_state_name, a.flow_start_time,a.flow_end_time,a.flow_end_limit_time,c.name_ as flow_param_name,c.text_ as flow_param_value
mapper.select:
select , c.USER_ID_ account_id,e.person_name as task_process_name,f.group_name as task_process_group,g.role_name task_process_role from t_flow_instance a,act_ru_task b left join act_ru_identitylink c on b.ID_=c.TASK_ID_ left join tab_accounts d on c.USER_ID_=d.account_name left join tab_person e on d.uuid=e.acc_uuid left join tab_group f on c.GROUP_ID_=f.group_code left join tab_role g on c.GROUP_ID_=g.role_no
1 = 1 and a.tfi_uuid=b.PROC_INST_ID_ and b.CLAIM_TIME_ is null and c.type_='candidate'
and (c.USER_ID_ = #{account_id} or c.GROUP_ID_ = #{group_id} or c.GROUP_ID_ = #{role_id} or b.ASSIGNEE_= #{account_id})
and a.tfi_uuid = #{tfi_uuid}
and a.flow_cn_name like concat(concat('%',#{flow_cn_name}),'%')
and b.name_ like concat(concat('%',#{task_step_name}),'%')
order by b.CREATE_TIME_ desc

select , b.ASSIGNEE_ account_id,e.person_name as task_process_name from t_flow_instance a,act_ru_task b left join tab_accounts d on b.ASSIGNEE_=d.account_name left join tab_person e on d.uuid=e.acc_uuid
1 = 1 and a.tfi_uuid=b.PROC_INST_ID_ and b.CLAIM_TIME_ is not null
and b.ASSIGNEE_ = #{account_id}
and a.tfi_uuid = #{tfi_uuid}
and a.flow_cn_name like concat(concat('%',#{flow_cn_name}),'%')
and b.name_ like concat(concat('%',#{task_step_name}),'%')
order by b.CREATE_TIME_ desc

SELECT , b.ASSIGNEE_ account_id,e.person_name as task_process_name from t_flow_instance a,act_hi_taskinst b left join tab_accounts d on b.ASSIGNEE_=d.account_name left join tab_person e on d.uuid=e.acc_uuid
1 = 1 and a.tfi_uuid=b.PROC_INST_ID_ and b.CLAIM_TIME_ is not null and not exists (select * from act_ru_task f where b.ID_=f.ID_)
and b.ASSIGNEE_ = #{account_id}
and a.tfi_uuid = #{tfi_uuid}
and a.flow_cn_name like concat(concat('%',#{flow_cn_name}),'%')
and b.name_ like concat(concat('%',#{task_step_name}),'%')
order by b.START_TIME_ desc

select distinct * from ( select , d.account_name account_id,e.person_name as task_process_name from t_flow_instance a,act_ru_variable c left join tab_accounts d on c.TEXT_=d.account_name left join tab_person e on d.uuid=e.acc_uuid where a.tfi_uuid = c.PROC_INST_ID_ union select , d.account_name account_id,e.person_name from t_flow_instance a,act_hi_varinst c left join tab_accounts d on c.TEXT_=d.account_name left join tab_person e on d.uuid=e.acc_uuid where a.tfi_uuid = c.PROC_INST_ID_ ) a
1 = 1 and a.flow_param_name='startUserId'
and a.account_id = #{account_id}
and a.tfi_uuid = #{tfi_uuid}
and a.flow_cn_name like concat(concat('%',#{flow_cn_name}),'%')
and a.task_step_name like concat(concat('%',#{task_step_name}),'%')
order by a.flow_start_time desc
